ideas.name: SoilMoistureMapper
ideas.short_description: A handheld device that farmers walk through their fields with to create real-time soil moisture maps. It uses a probe that inserts into the ground and GPS to automatically log moisture readings at each location, then generates a color-coded field map showing dry zones that need irrigation priority.
key_features: Color-coded field visualization on mobile app
Offline data collection with sync capability

ideas.name: Smart Soil Moisture Probe
ideas.short_description: A handheld probe that measures soil moisture levels at various depths and provides instant recommendations for irrigation timing and water volume based on crop type and growth stage.
